name: Ikachan
description:
You wake up in an underwater cave.

Near the bottom of an enormous abyss, there's only one way out. Swim in a dark world under attack by frequent earthquakes and famine. This vast undersea kingdom is filled with both dangerous and harmless denizens. Its fearful inhabitants are led by a reluctant fish who has no answer to the impending disasters.

Their fate rests with you, Ikachan. You must help them find a way out before it's too late. Use whatever tools you can and try to escape.

Swim, Ikachan, swim!
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
